sentences.en: Carter thought the canary would lead them to the tomb.
sentences.cn: 卡特相信,这只金丝雀将会指引他们找到陵墓的所在.

sentences.en: He gently rattled the cage and whispered to the canary.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻晃动着鸟笼，和金丝雀轻声低语着。

sentences.en: He looks like the cat that ate the canary.
sentences.cn: 他看起来(臭美得)像只偷腥的猫.

sentences.en: He said he would try to write or call as soon as he reached the Canary Islands.
sentences.cn: 他说他一到加那利群岛就会设法写信或者打电话来。

sentences.en: His body was found at sea in waters off the Canary Islands.
sentences.cn: 他的尸体在离加那利群岛不远的海上被发现。

sentences.en: I coaxed the canary into the cage.
sentences.cn: 我巧妙地使金丝雀进入笼子里.

sentences.en: In the following season, they found a yellow canary.
sentences.cn: 在接下来的日子里, (一天)特的探险队发现了一只黄金丝雀.

sentences.en: In the morning every canary was dead of fright.
sentences.cn: 到了早上,每一只金丝雀都因受惊吓而死.

sentences.en: Look for some petal earth tones like canary yellow and light natural shades like aqua! There will be soon a dramatic transformation in your wedding that soon forms a fab.
sentences.cn: 不妨寻找一些如金丝雀黄或如水流动的天然亮色作为裙摆的颜色，这将会使你的婚礼有一个充满戏剧性的出人意料的改变！

sentences.en: SANDSTORM LEAVING NORTH AFRICA TOWARDS THE ATLANTIC – CANARY ISLAND.
sentences.cn: 大漠的风沙正离开刚刚肆虐过的北非,一路弥漫着冲向大西洋中的加纳利群岛.

sentences.en: So this is how traditional clothes on the Canary Islands look like.
sentences.cn: 这是卡纳利小岛居民的传统服饰.

sentences.en: The canary has escaped from the cage.
sentences.cn: 那只金丝雀已从笼子里跑掉了.

sentences.en: The Canary Islands in the Pacific are named after what animal?
sentences.cn: 金丝雀群岛的名字是以什么动物命名的?

sentences.en: The canary warbled all day long.
sentences.cn: 那只金丝雀整天在鸣叫.

sentences.en: The cat is on the chair trying to get at the canary.
sentences.cn: 这只猫在椅子上打着金丝雀的主意.

sentences.en: Tommy: I cleaned the bird cage and the canary disappeared.
sentences.cn: 汤米: 我刚才打扫鸟笼来着,金丝雀不见了.

sentences.en: Your software project might have its own kind of pit canary.
sentences.cn: 您的软件项目也可以有自己的矿井金丝雀。

phrases.tran_cn: 加那利群岛；金丝雀群岛

trans.tran_cn: [动]金丝雀，淡黄色，（十六世纪流行于法国及西班牙的）加那利舞，加那利白葡萄酒
trans.tran_en: a small yellow bird that people often keep as a pet
